ECParameterSpec

getECParameterSpec

public static LunaNamedCurve getECParameterSpec(String name)
Checks the OID map for the given string. If a match is found, return that curve. If no match is found, return any match that's found in the common-name map.

Parameters:
name - OID or common name
Returns:
The LunaNamedCurve corresponding to the OID/name, if found

getECParameterSpec

public static LunaNamedCurve getECParameterSpec(int length)
Return EC parameters for the specified field size. If there are known NIST recommended parameters for the given length, they are returned. Otherwise, if there are multiple matches for the given size, an arbitrary one is returned. If no parameters are known, the method returns null. NOTE that this method returns both prime and binary curves.

Parameters:
length -
Returns:
An ECParameterSpec with the specified field size

getECParameterSpecById

public static LunaNamedCurve getECParameterSpecById(int id)
Returns the LunaNamedCurve corresponding to the given internal curve id. This method exists for backwards compatibility with older versions of the Luna provider, and its use is discouraged.

Parameters:
id - An internal numerical identifier for this curve.
Returns:
The LunaNamedCurve corresponding to that id

getNamedCurve

public static LunaNamedCurve getNamedCurve(ECParameterSpec params)
Look up the LunaNamedCurve corresponding to the parameters in the given ECParameterSpec object.

Parameters:
params - The EC parameter spec to convert
Returns:
The corresponding LunaNamedCurve, or null if the specs represent an unknown or non-named curve

knownECParameterSpecs

public static Collection<LunaNamedCurve> knownECParameterSpecs()
